Stay Hungry

Send in a Recipe

Have your recipe published and give back to the community! Although we focus on meals with meat in them, we also feature recipes of non-meat filled but still delicious, fatty foods.

Make a Video

Do you have your own way of spicing up a meal? We love seeing how other people make their meats. This site has a non-judging, active community, so feel free to send us a video of you cooking, whether the recipe is an original or from this site. Please review your video before you send it!

Join the Team

We invite all qualified candiates to submit a resume. Whether you're fit or you're flabulous, we want your talent! Can you filet a mignon like none other? Can you dice a sausage in less in a minute? We require cover letters.
